name: avalynx-table
title: AvalynxTable
description: AvalynxTable is a simple table system for web applications. Based on Bootstrap >=5.3 without any framework dependencies.

author.name: Juergen Schwind an the Avalynx-Table authors

scripts.build: shx rm -rf dist; shx mkdir -p dist/js/; shx cp src/js/avalynx-table.js dist/js/avalynx-table.js; shx cp src/js/avalynx-table.js dist/js/avalynx-table.esm.js; node build.js dist/js/avalynx-table.esm.js; shx mkdir -p dist/css/; shx cp src/css/avalynx-table.css dist/css/avalynx-table.css
